text: K Callan (born Katherine Elizabeth Borman; January 9, 1936) is an American author and actress. She is best known for playing Clark Kent's mother Martha in the ABC television series Lois & Clark: The New Adventures of Superman. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Writers from Texas Category:Actors from Dallas
title: K Callan
